statements: SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) as num_prescriptions FROM medication_prescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE dosage > 10
SELECT medication_name, frequency, patient_id, prescription_id, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'daily'
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, frequency, prescription_id, dosage FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM medication_prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE '%acetaminophen%'
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medication_prescriptions ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 10;
SELECT p.patient_name, pr.medication_name FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY prescription_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE medication_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(prescription_id) AS num_prescriptions FROM prescriptions GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(prescription_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE dosage='50mg';
SELECT prescription_id, prescription_date FROM prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE dosage >= '50 mg'

SELECT prescriptions.prescription_id, patients.patient_name, medications.medication_name, prescriptions.dosage, prescriptions.prescription_date FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN medications ON prescriptions.medication_id = medications.medication_id
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC

SELECT prescriptions.prescription_id, patients.patient_name, medications.medication_name, prescriptions.dosage, prescriptions.prescription_date FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id INNER JOIN medications ON prescriptions.medication_id = medications.medication_id WHERE prescriptions.prescription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Prescription;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM Prescription ORDER BY dosage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Doctor WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Prescription;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM Prescription WHERE frequency='daily';
SELECT Patient.patient_name, Patient.age, Doctor.doctor_name FROM Patient INNER JOIN Doctor ON Patient.patient_id = Doctor.doctor_id;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage, Patient.patient_name FROM Prescription INNER JOIN Patient ON Prescription.patient_id = Patient.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctor ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE frequency > 3;
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions WHERE dosage BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0;

SELECT p.patient_name, m.medication_name, pr.prescription_date FROM Patients p, Medications m, Prescriptions pr WHERE p.patient_id = pr.patient_id AND m.medication_id = pr.medication_id ORDER BY pr.prescription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Medications ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM Prescriptions JOIN Medications ON Prescriptions.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;

SELECT Nurses.nurse_name, COUNT(*) AS num_administrations FROM Administrations JOIN Prescriptions ON Administrations.prescription_id = Prescriptions.prescription_id JOIN Nurses ON Prescriptions.nurse_id = Nurses.nurse_id GROUP BY Nurses.nurse_name ORDER BY num_administrations DESC;
